Method Detail

makeNewBid

public boolean makeNewBid(int x,
                          int y,
                          int amount)
Create a new Bid from on the client, test that it is valid, and send the bid to the server if it is valid.

Parameters:
x - The x location on the Grid.
y - The y location on the Grid.
amount - The $ amount of the bid.
Returns:
True if the Bid is valid.

Temporarially create a SeismicRequest so that a cost can be calculated and returned to the GUI.

Parameters:
startx - Starting coordinate of the request.
starty -
endx - Ending coordinate of the request.
endy -
Returns:

setGridLimits

public void setGridLimits(int xLimit,
                          int yLimit)
Set the grid size on the client for use in checking valid input.

Parameters:
xLimit - Maximum x (horizontal-right) value
yLimit - Maximum y (vertical-down) value
